name: Gun Hockey
description:
Shoot the puck into your opponent's goal.

Ammo is replenished with bullets that go into your own goal.

Player 1 (Left):

  • Spacebar shoots
  • W and S aim up and down

Player 2 (Right):

  • Enter shoots
  • Arrows aim up and down

Art, Code, and SFX by Nolan Baker

Music originally by Sketchy Logic, made into loops by yours truly

https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles
